content.query:
IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'nyc-synapse-cosmos-db'))
    
    CREATE CREDENTIAL [nyc-synapse-cosmos-db]
    WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = ''
GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=nyc-synapse-cosmos-db;Database=nyctaxidb',
                OBJECT = 'heartbeat',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'nyc-synapse-cosmos-db'
) AS [heartbeat]
